Interface ISecurityService

    public interface ISecurityService
    The security service description.

      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails getConnectedUser()
      Gets the current connected user.
      java.lang.String getConnectedUserId()
      Returns the identifier of the connected user, or null if the user is not connected.

      Gets the current connected user.

      Returns true if the connected user is an administrator, false otherwise.
      boolean isAuthenticated()
      Returns true if the connected user is authenticated, false otherwise.
      boolean isUser​(java.lang.String userId)
      Returns true if the connected user is the required user.
